incident.location: Intersection of Dale Mabry Hwy and Spruce St, Tampa, FL
incident.description: Claimant states he was rear-ended by an unidentified vehicle while stopped at a red light. The other vehicle fled the scene. Claimant reports severe whiplash and back pain. No police report filed. No witnesses. Claimant drove home after the incident and sought medical treatment 5 days later at QuickCare Medical Center.

raw_text:
INSURANCE CLAIM FORM

Claimant: Robert J. Mitchell
Policy: FL-AUTO-2025-88421
Date of Loss: December 18, 2025

DESCRIPTION OF INCIDENT:
I was driving my 2019 BMW X5 southbound on Dale Mabry Highway at approximately 11:45 PM on December 18, 2025. I was stopped at a red light at the intersection with Spruce Street when I was rear-ended by another vehicle. The impact was severe and pushed my vehicle into the intersection. The other driver did not stop and fled the scene. I was unable to get the license plate number due to the shock of the collision.

I experienced immediate neck and back pain but was able to drive home. I initially tried to rest and recover but the pain worsened over the following days. I sought medical treatment at QuickCare Medical Center on December 23, 2025, where I was diagnosed with severe whiplash, lumbar strain, and shoulder impingement.

I have been receiving ongoing treatment at Tampa Pain Management Associates including physical therapy, chiropractic adjustments, and pain management injections. My treating physician states I may require surgery if symptoms do not improve.

DAMAGE ASSESSMENT:
Rear bumper replacement: $4,200
Trunk lid repair: $2,800
Rear quarter panel repair: $1,500
Paint and refinish: $500
Total vehicle damage: $9,000

MEDICAL EXPENSES:
Emergency evaluation: $1,200
MRI (cervical spine): $3,500
MRI (lumbar spine): $3,500
Physical therapy (24 sessions): $12,000
Chiropractic care (18 visits): $5,400
Pain management injections (3): $9,000
Prescription medications: $1,400
Future surgery estimate: $2,500
Total medical: $38,500

TOTAL CLAIM: $47,500

I declare that the above information is true and accurate to the best of my knowledge.

Signed: Robert J. Mitchell
Date: January 2, 2026
